00037     typedef unsigned int vertex_descriptor;
00038     typedef std::pair<vertex_descriptor, vertex_descriptor>
00039     edge_descriptor;

00048     // ---------
00049     // viterator
00050     // ---------
00051 
00057     class vertex_iterator {
00058     private:
00059       vertex_descriptor pos;
00060     public:
00061       vertex_iterator(vertex_descriptor pos) {
00062         this->pos = pos;
00063       }
00064 
00065       vertex_iterator operator ++ () {
00066         ++pos;
00067         return *this;
00068       }
00069 
00070       vertex_iterator operator ++ (int) {
00071         vertex_iterator tmp(*this);
00072         pos++;
00073         return tmp;
00074       }
00075 
00076       vertex_descriptor operator * () {
00077         return pos;
00078       }
00079 
00080       bool operator != (const vertex_iterator& rhs) {
00081         return pos != rhs.pos;
00082       }
00083     };
00084 
00085     /*
00086      *a helper struct to call the edge_iterator constructor for beginning and the end
00087      */
00088 
00089     struct end_tag {};
00090     struct start_tag {};
00091 
00092     /*
00093      *inner class to iterate through all the edges inside the graph class
00094      *
00095      */
00096 
00097     class edge_iterator {
00098     private:
00099       const Graph* thegraph;
00100       vertex_iterator vpos;
00101       std::set<vertex_descriptor>::iterator epos;
00102       std::set<vertex_descriptor> empty_set; // if the graph is empty 
00103       // we need a dummy empty set
00104     public:
00105      //constructor for begin() of all the edges
00106       edge_iterator(const Graph* g, start_tag) : thegraph(g), vpos(vertex_iterator(0)) {
00107         if(!( thegraph->g.empty()) ) epos = thegraph->g[*vpos].begin();
00108         else epos = empty_set.begin();
00109       }
00110      //constructor for end() of all the edges
00111       edge_iterator(const Graph* g, end_tag) : thegraph(g),
00112                                                vpos(vertex_iterator(thegraph->g.size() - 1)) {     
00113         if(!( thegraph->g.empty()) ) epos = thegraph->g[*vpos].end();
00114         else epos = empty_set.end();
00115       }
00116       edge_iterator operator ++ () {
00117         if(epos == thegraph->g[*vpos].end()) {
00118           vpos++;
00119           epos = thegraph->g[*vpos].begin();
00120         }
00121         else {
00122           epos++;
00123         }
00124         return *this;
00125       }
00126 
00127       edge_iterator operator ++ (int) {
00128         edge_iterator tmp = *this;
00129         ++(*this);
00130         return tmp;
00131       }
00132 
00133       edge_descriptor operator * () {
00134         return edge_descriptor(*vpos, *epos);
00135       }
00136 
00137       bool operator != (const edge_iterator& rhs) {
00138         if(this == &rhs)
00139           return false;
00140         else
00141           return epos != rhs.epos || vpos != rhs.vpos ||
00142             thegraph != rhs.thegraph;
00143       }
00144     }; // end edge iterator

00156     friend void remove_edge
00157     (vertex_descriptor u, vertex_descriptor v, Graph& myG) {
00158       myG.g[u].erase(v);
00159     }
00160

00162     // add_edge
00163     // --------
00164 
00173     friend std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool>
00174     add_edge (vertex_descriptor x, vertex_descriptor y, Graph& myG) {
00175       bool            b = myG.g[x].insert(y).second;
00176       edge_descriptor ed(x,y);// = std::make_pair(a,b);
00177       return std::make_pair(ed, b);
00178     }
00179

00181     // add_vertex
00182     // ----------
00183         
00190     friend vertex_descriptor
00191     add_vertex (Graph& myG) {
00192       myG.g.push_back( std::set<vertex_descriptor>() );
00193       return myG.ind++;
00194     }
00195         
00196     // -----------------
00197     // adjacent_vertices
00198     // -----------------
00199         
00208     friend std::pair<adjacency_iterator, adjacency_iterator>
00209     adjacent_vertices (vertex_descriptor x, const Graph& myG) {
00210       adjacency_iterator b = myG.g[x].begin();
00211       adjacency_iterator e = myG.g[x].end();
00212       return std::make_pair(b, e);
00213     }

00215     // ----
00216     // edge
00217     // ----
00218         
00224     friend std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool>
00225     edge (vertex_descriptor x, vertex_descriptor y, const Graph& myG) {
00226       assert(x < (myG.ind - 1));
00227       bool            b = myG.g[x].count(y);
00228       edge_descriptor ed(x, y);
00229       return std::make_pair(ed, b);
00230     }
00231 
00232     // -----
00233     // edges
00234     // -----
00235         
00241     friend std::pair<edge_iterator, edge_iterator>
00242     edges (const Graph& mygraph) {
00243       edge_iterator b(&mygraph, start_tag());
00244       edge_iterator e(&mygraph, end_tag());
00245       return std::make_pair(b, e);
00246     }

00258     friend vertex_descriptor
00259     vertex (vertices_size_type n, const Graph& myG) {
00260       assert(n < myG.g.size());
00261       return static_cast<vertex_descriptor>(n);
00262     }
00263 
00264     // --------
00265     // vertices
00266     // --------
00267         
00274     friend std::pair<vertex_iterator, vertex_iterator>
00275     vertices (const Graph& mygraph) {
00276       vertex_iterator b(0);
00277       vertex_iterator e(mygraph.g.size() - 1);
00278       return std::make_pair(b, e);
00279     }

00291     source (edge_descriptor x, const Graph& myG) {
00292       assert(x.first < myG.g.size() );
00293       return x.first;

00313         
00319     friend edges_size_type
00320     num_edges (const Graph& myG) {
00321       edges_size_type num = 0;
00322       for(unsigned int i = 0; i< myG.g.size(); ++i) {
00323         num += myG.g[i].size();
00324       }
00325       return num;
00326     }

00359       return ind == g.size();
